SchemaSettings.name: SchemaSettings
SchemaSettings.label: Schema Settings
SchemaSettings.description: Represents SchemaSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableAdvancedCMTSecurity.description: enable Advanced C M T Security field of SchemaSettings metadata component.

enableListCustomSettingCreation.description: enable List Custom Setting Creation field of SchemaSettings metadata component.
